namelist_definition.entry: MOSART coupling period (sec). Default: 10800 Can ONLY be set by modifying the value of the xml variable ROF_NCPL in env_run.xml.
MOSART time step (sec). Default: 3600 Internal mosart timestep, will be adjusted down to be integer multiple of coupling_period if necessary
Default: .true. If .true., river runoff will be split up into liquid and ice streams, otherwise ice runoff will be zero and all runoff directed to liquid stream.
Default: .false. If .true., water management model will be turned on.

If .true., turn on mosart river routing Default: .true. If the value of the xml variable ROF GRID in env_build.xml is set to 'null', then the MOSART build-namelist will set do_mosart to .false. If do_mosart is set to .false., then MOSART will send a flag of rof_prognostic = .false. back to the coupler on initialization.
If .true., turn on mosart flooding back to clm Default: .false. Note that mosart flood is not supported in CESM1.1
Decomposition Option for mosart Default: 'basin'
sparse matrix multiply Option for mosart Default: 'opt'
Full pathname of initial mosart file Default: ' '
Full pathname of master restart file for a branch run. (only used if RUN_TYPE=branch) (Set with xml variables RUN_REFCASE and RUN_REFDATE in env_run.xml)
Full pathname of input datafile for MOSART.
Fields to exclude from history tape series 1. Default: ' '
Fields to exclude from history tape series 2. Default: ' '
Fields to exclude from history tape series 3. Default: ' '
Fields to add to history tape series 1. Default: ' '
Fields to add to history tape series 2. Default: ' '
Fields to add to history tape series 3. Default: ' '
Per tape series maximum number of time samples. Default: 1,30,30
Per tape series history file density (i.e. output precision) 1=double precision 2=single precision Default: 2,2,2
Per tape series history write frequency. positive means in time steps 0=monthly negative means hours (i.e. 24 means every 24 time-steps and -24 means every day Default: 0,-24,-24
